00001 #include "chemo_detect.h"
00002 #include "enose.h"
00003 
00004 #define DETECT_PERIOD 8 /* *4Hz */
00005 #define THRESHOLD 150
00006 
00007 uint16_t chemo_sensor;
00008 
00009 void chemo_init( void ) {
00010   chemo_sensor = 0;
00011 }
00012 
00013 void chemo_periodic( void ) {
00014 #ifdef ENOSE
00015   static uint16_t vals[ENOSE_NB_SENSOR][DETECT_PERIOD];
00016   static int idx;
00017 
00018   /* Detection on the first sensor */
00019   int dval = enose_val[0] - vals[0][idx];
00020   if (dval < -THRESHOLD) {
00021     chemo_sensor = -dval;
00022   } else
00023     chemo_sensor = 0;
00024 
00025   int i;
00026   for(i = 0; i < ENOSE_NB_SENSOR; i++)
00027     vals[i][idx] = enose_val[i];
00028 
00029   idx++;
00030   if (idx > DETECT_PERIOD)
00031     idx = 0;
00032 #endif /* ENOSE */
00033 }
